name: FOG PIERCER
description:
Controls:

RMB - rotate around the train

LMB - shoot

Mouse wheel - zoom

The game:

Drive your train through a thick fog whilst battling forces of nature, upgrade your train to increase your chances of survival, and make sure you survive.

Upgrades:

Passenger cars - receive more money at the end of a run

Combat cars - higher DPS against the fog monsters!

Story:

You're an engine driver in a world where humanity has befallen to deep fog. People still need to get to other towns which is dangerous as the fog dispatches forces that try to consume you. Become a legendary engine driver!

Bratislava Game Jam 22 submission
